favourite.article: Be at rest for this is the highest service. Cast all our cares on Him be at rest! Thank You Lord! You want us to come into Your rest!

Thank You Lord Jesus because I know You hear me and care about me. Thanks because I can rest on You and in that secret place I want to praise You and glorify You for all Your wonders in my life. I love You Lord Jesus! My rest! My Redeemer!
Ã” God, help my life proclain Your power and love. You are a God who works and hear our prayers.
I love the verse 4 so much, to those who are seeking or searching for GOD in the wrong place, the verse is like a plain and simple answer. There is a place of quiet rest and that is the heart of GOD.
